title: People think my name is asian but im really african
body: My favorite food is rice as i use to like scavenging for this precious resource in the plain fields of africa, even 10 grams of rice is worth brawling a couple of penguins as the scent of rice itself is better than any panadol or  medical marijuana one would say per say (people might also think im asian because of my korean like mechanics but little did people should already know that mechanics = fast fingers and everyone that us africans are the fastest at anything physical like running and this also includes finger movements or fingering for short)
